values: jonathan is home, and he wants to see people, so jus call him or me if you dont have his number.

<center> ok,so .. this past month has had the most changes that my life has ever gone through. They are good changes. life is crazy.

School is over, thank God. I have been out for about 3 weeks now. and my grades were awesome. so im 99.9% positive that i got into the nursing program. Only  3 of us out of my group of friends, of like 10, know that our grades met the standards for the program. That's how hard this fuckin program is ... it was one crazy year. i feel proud though, that i was one of the few that proved that i can do it.

Jonathan and I borke up over a month ago, and I have been doing pretty good, actually very good, considering we were together for 4 fuckin years. 

I am now seeing this guy Charlie, and he is amazing, and of coarse he is in the Marines, just my luck ... i meet an awesome guy and he is in the military, marines of all. but i fall for him more and more. He's the polar opposite of Jonathan hahaha. I love being around Charlie, he's so much fun.

The other day I was talkin to someone who said something to me that I never thought I would hear, especially from him, he said "damn sarah, you didn't give anyone a chance to get you" ... it made my day thats fer sure. but it has been surprising at how many people told me similar things in this past month. i never thought anyone really noticed me.

heya

yea, so if most of you didn't know, me and jonathan have broken up. It's been a week now. we have our reasons. it was a great four years.

school is almost over and I can't wait! Finals are approaching and i have like freshmanitis lol. I just want it to be summer. I'm sick of all the drama here at school. it's all girl, what did i expect? haha

I can't wait till next year, Im almost positive that I will get in the nursing program, so that's exciting. I can't wait till we start clinicals, that should be interesting haha. 

I also can't wait till next year because i will be roomming with someone who isn't insane and is my best friend haha. I love her, her name is Liz.

Yesterday was the last time the OC will EVER film here again!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! YAYAYAYAYAYA. haha. it was graduation. it's really fucking annoying when they are here. I wish I was as skinny as Mischa Barton. She had the cutest dress on.

anyways, how is everyone else doing?

wow, i haven't been on here in forever.

It's weird seeing all your posts and thinking about how much my life has change since highschool. I have made so many new friends and have just made a totally different life for myself, and I love it.

My life has consisted of school, friends, and jonathan. Both of our lives have changed, and so has our relationship. It is so much stronger. I dont know what i would do without him. 

School is so hard and so time consuming. I thought this semester was going to be a breeze compared to last semester, but was I wrong. I wish I could go back to last year, but then again I love this year, and dont want to go back. Now that i think about it, i don't want to go back. My friends are so awesome, my relationship with jonathan is so much stronger, and i have just grown up so much this year now that i think back to it. 

The drama is definately there, but it's not like highschool, thats for sure. like my roommate getting pregnant, then supposedly having a miscarriage, but we all know she went to plan parenthood. ha. 

I just can't put into words how much this year has changed me and how much fun it has been.

im so excited. im flying out to see jonathan tomorrow!!! yay.





i love college.

IM SO EXCITED! Im goin to be visiting jonathan in 3 weeks.eeeee!!!!!!!!!! gah, i cant wait. You all should go to my myspace and see the pic of us together the weekend he graduated, he is so cute in his uniform! lol. especially in his blues (another uniform which happens to be black lol). i miss him so much. can u beleive that we have been dating for 3 1/2 years?! craziness. 4 years in july. im gunna marry him, i swear. :) well i hope.

anyway, how are you guys? i never talk to anyone, and you never comment back to me .. what the fuck?

well i must get to my crap load of hw.

P.S. CONGRATS LIZ!!!!! Well to you and kyle :) ... isn't it amazing? :)

hey guys! i haven't been on here in forever. well i do have a life, LOL. 

anyhoo. im loving life right now, even though jonathan lives like 4000 miles away. he now has a cell phone and we can talk on the phone. its so weird, it feels like a luxury now after bootcamp. im gunna go visit him in about 4 weeks, presidents day weekend!!!! i cant wait. His graduation was really fun, and loved hanging out and getting to know his parents better. It was fun. (even though he can't do any PDA in uniform!!!!!, jus like Marching band). he told me that we are going to celebrate valentines day when i get there :). i can't wait!

It's so awesome too because cory is there. hi cory! lol. but jonathan already has close friends and a best friend there in so. carolina (they met in bootcamp). i met a couple of them at his grad. im so proud of him :). 

well im gunna go, cuz im sick of typing lol. and im on my roommates comp.

hope u guys do well on your finals!

so ... im at the grandparents in hollister right now. my 5 year old cousin is goin nuts, and indie wont stop barking. my cousina are tooo cute. breanna is almost two, i cant believe it, and she is the most precious thing ever; her hair is white blonde. we haven't been up here for xmas in forever, usually its just easter and thanksgiving. i cant wait to see my asian cousins tomorrow. :).

i went to hit golf balls with my grandpa today. it was quite relaxing, yet embarrassing lol. i hadn't hit a golf ball in over a year. i miss playing golf soo much. i got new clubs and everything. for those of you who didn't know, i was on varsity golf my freshman year, i wasn't in marching band. 

well this year is going to be hard. i miss jonathan sooo much. i got another letter from him :).

merry christmas everyone!

i cant wait to see my cousins!!!! yay

Here's Jonathan, reporting from bootcamp:

Hey everyone,
Man this sucks. Its like a mix between bnad camp and maximum security prison. No, it's not so bad. I'm getting use to it. I've done pretty well so far, and apparently we have gotten past the worst week (week 2). It's suppose to feel much faster and much less pointless from now on. My days have been filled with inspections (to make sure my underwear and everything are ironed and folded properly), PT, IT (intensive training- punishment), lots of eating, yelling, and cleaning. We clean a lot. A LOT. LOTS.

The food  here is bearable, but the gas it produces is rancid (and it produces a lot). My RDCs are the best in my ship (we are the best division so far thanks to them) and are also the least difficult to deal with. They teach us what we are suppose to do rather than beat us for not doing it, after not being taught, which the other divisions do. Don't get me wrong, our chief can be ruthless when it comes to discipling us.

I heard the Air Force Boot CAMP is easy as hell. I won't go into what they do, but if you decide to join the "military" and don't want to stop being a civilian, join the Air Force. If you want to join a real military, join the navy or the marines. Don't do Army. Just my words of advice. Actually I'm hoping that someone will join to keep me company.

Ok, I need some letters. My address is:

(ok so i already gave you guys the address and dont feel like typing it out again. So if you want it, go to my live journal entries)

 (now back to jonathan)  WRITE ME!!!! I wanna know everyone is. Let me know what is going on back at home. Send me some pictures. Marching Band has helped me so much with this whole thing. A lot of the discipline, marching, leadership, and experience with large groups carries over into this. I'm a section leader here, which is much like a section leader in the band. It's pretty cool- I get a collar device (two chevrons and an eagle). Ok, I hope everyone is doing well! Merry Christmas, and Chanika (i had to spell it like he did in the letter LOL), and enjoy Kwanza and what not, and happy new years! TTYL WRITE ME!!!!!!!



-Jonathan


ahhhh ... i miss him sooo much. I look forward to his letters sooo much. I started crying becasue i thought iw asn't going to get one this week, because i got one on thursday last week, and the only days he can write are on sundays. but i was very releaved to see i got one from him. :) HIS MOM BAUGHT ME A PLANE TICKET (ALONG WITH HER'S AND JAMES') TO GO SEE HIS GRADUATION!!!!!!!!!! I was so excited when she told me.



Omg!!! Im so happy. ASOLUTELY NO SCHOOL FOR A WHOLE MONTH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! but i already miss my friends. :(

im so head over heels in love, no joke.

:)

ok. so here is jonathan's address!!! he would love to hear from you guys. he loves getting letters :).

S.R HINES, J.A.
DIV. 055 SHIP 09
RECRUIT TRAINING COMMAND
3415 SAILOR DRIVE
GREAT LAKES, IL
60088-3515

HE CALLED ME TODAY! omg, i about cried, hearing his voice. So, I am definately going to his graduation and i cant wait! i miss he soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo very much. 

Its so weird, i can't stop smiling, and all we did was talk for 15 min.
i just found out that my 7th grade history teacher, mr mitch (sactown), shot and killed himself. never would have thought.

ok, so tonight i went over to UCLA to watch a couple of my friends kick some ass in the intermeral volleyball championships, and before the game we met up with my friend rachel's friend. annnnnddd... i saw the marching band. O.M.G i just wanted to grab my clarinet and run onto the field and start playing with them. i just wanted to stay there and watch the practice lol. i also saw ben, haha. but he didn't see me. they sounded awesome. i kept telling my friends that we should go back and watch lol, and they just laughed at me. im such a nerd. but i really do wish i could play in that band. i think i can (seeing as my school is the sister school to UCLA) but i just dont have time. maybe i'll transfer in a couple years lol, just for the band. anyway, just thought i would tell you guys.

ahhhh thank god! i finished my english research paper, it took me a total of about 5 hours.seriously.

wow. i love my friends here. well all hung out in my room last night and played 10 fingers and read the sex tips in cosmo lol. we have our own soroity and we're called the mo fo bitches, it awesome. we are going to have a ceremony soon and everything, with our own candles. and make our nicknames official lol.

so .. i miss jonathan. it sucked over break especially. seeing jackie always talking to her boyfriend, and mary and matt going out, i was jeleous. me and kevin are gunna go to his graduation along with his parents, it should be fun sharing a hotel room with kevin lol.

well i need to get to my micro bio lab, ew, and figure out which organisms i have haha ( we have to do tests, and then try to figure which ones we have.

ahhh ... only two more weeks! then im free for a whole month!!!!!!!!!!!

wow .. soo .. I miss Jonathan like I've never missed anyone before. I hate this. I have a picture of us from 10th grade band banquet on my desk, and i think about how much we have gone through since then, its amazing. I cant wait to get a letter from him. I already wrote him a letter, and i bought some cards that im gunna send him throughout his bootcamp time. I wonder how he's doing.

So, I got a job at Macy's in gift wrap. Im gunna be working with tina! yay. lol. I got all the closing shifts though on wed. fri. and sat. LOL. but i dont care, i have nothing else to do. so why not make some money? plus its gift wrap, nothing really happens from 6-10:30. there is a lot more to do though than just goft wrapping. like all the calls and crap come through.

Bush is startin to piss me off.

jackie comes home next week! yay.

i need to write my research paper for english, she wants the rough drft on mon., gah.

i miss my jonathan.

matt told me to go to college last night, because I came home (for work). wtf? i mean w.t.f? you see mary how much, how much do you make out with her in front of me? y do you care? thanks for making me feel like you friend.

nobody loves me. whatever.

I just recently found out that my friend cynthia passed away last night. I dont know if any of you knew walter cervantes but he was her bf and they were in a car accident last night. Walter came out with out a scratch, but cynthia didn't. They hit a telephone pole and it took the firefighters 25 minutes to get it off of her. Walter was speeding in order to check if his brakes were working properly, not a smart idea. Walter is one of my frends and i am happy that he is ok, but what he did was extremely irresponsible. Cynthia was one of my lab partners for anatomy last year along with my friend parissa, and they were really good friends. It's so weird .... me and cynthia also go to the same church and got confirmed the same year. I can't believe it. She was so gorgeous and had so much ahead of her.

omg, i found my best friend from like 4th and 5th grade on facebook. :). her name is ashley dziuk. in 4th grade we were both obssessed with the baby sitters club, lol, and so we made our own club called "the best friends club" and we made membership cards for it and everything, and on the back of them it said "best friends forever." She was president and i was vice president. i always seem to be vice president, i was even vice resident of my 5th grade class, (and band lol). anyways, i still have the membership card lol. i also still have the half heart necklace. you know those necklaces where each of you gets one have of it, that says best friends on it? haha .. i miss those days.

So we sprayed air freshner throughout the room and bathroom, and one of sweetmates walk in and was like, "I'm so sorry guys!!" lol. our sweetmates our the girls that share the bathroom with us. we were laughing so hard, not becasue she smelled everything up, but because it smelled and she was embarrssed lol. shitshitshitshitshitshitSHIT! WHY!

GOD! I dont get it. I've been in this different happy mode, this different feeling in my new life, but then when i think i have gotten rid of all those old feelings of being sad and depressed, it happens. jus .. SNAP! here they are, the same problems, and they bring back all these horrible memories of how i use to feel at home in simi, laying in bed and crying myself to sleep every other night. It's weird. I feel like i live in a different world now, but then i realize that my old world isn't going to go away jus because im in college now, everything is still with me, i jus live somewhere else. Its actually making things worse now. At this point i feel like im beating a dead horse. You know, i get all excited about coming home during the weekend, but once i enter simi this flood of jus, boredom and what am i going to actually do this weekend that i should be so happy about?, rushes through me.

Im also very happy that we now have a tv and a fridge in here, and that my msmc email, web advisor, blackboard, aaaaaaand my printer are working AT THE SAME TIME! lol. im really pissed though that almost everything this school does is through the internet and their email and web advisor never work! people are always having trouble.

I also love the fact that most people here are catholic lol. and so ..... they agree with me on most things, and talk shit about all the stupid things that are happening here in america lol. my roommate is more impatient than me lol. and if most of you have driven with me you would kno how impatient i am. and my roommate is worse lol.

I love my roommate with all my heart!!!!! me and my friends at school have weird nick names for eachother, its quite amusing, but how did i end up with the gross one? lol. we have also decided to do a movie/tennis night, lol, once a week!

Ok, so everything is moved into my dorm .... buuuuut im not there, lol. i wanted to stay here before my life gets crazy over there, and my room is fureakin small! I have way too much clothes lol, so me and my dad went and got some starage thingys yesterday that im gunna put in my closet, becasue i have absolutely no more room in my room lol. im totally bringing my tv, cant live without it, adn i think the cable is part of my room payment. my roommate also wants to get a fridge and i have no prob with that, lol. i saw a good one at walmart for $134. God i love bed bath and beyond! they have the things you need for your dorm down to like ... EVERYTHING! lol. i suggest to go there if you ever need anything for your dorm.

Well since i left my purse in the van, adn my dad is at work with the keys to the van, im stuck here at home. so someone come save me. i also really need to get my binders ready, lol and they're all in my room waiting for me to do them, but i can't since i cant get there. I was planning on leaving at around 3 but, but now i can't leave till around 7! i wonder how traffic is gunna be on the 405 then? I START SCHOOL TOMORROW!!!!! I CANT BELIEVE IT! im scared.

It's real now. I didn't think it was actually going to happen, in that i knew it was gunna happen but jus couldn't. jackie is gone. I thought that if I didn't admit to it, it wasn't really going to happen. this is the first time im actually admitting it, and my head is spinning like mad. I'm not suppose to be doing this alone. Jackie has always been right beside me or behind me in lines waiting to get our IDs, or going to the first day of 1st grade together and being attatched to the hip all through elementry school , or being there with me on the first day of 6th grade going into the big bad world of middle school, crying with me because we both didn't want to be in band, being there right next to me when we moved to simi in the middle of 7th grade and we were eachothers only friends, she was there walking with me to 1st period band on the first day of highschool, being the first to congradulate me on making first chair clarinet because she was the one who came with me to check, and then being half the reason i joined marching band, she was always there when i had a question on my hw, she was always with me in the back room hanging out when mary was getting yelled at, lol, she was standing right next to me when Royal played the show for the seniors one last time, and then we had our final walk together .... graduation. She was right next to me then. You know, it may have seemed that sometimes i hated being in the same grade with her, but i loved every single moment of it, and I wouldn't have had at any other way. I never had to worry about being alone when going into something new, because she was always doing it with me. I always had someone to talk to to. She was my permanant best friend. I couldn't cry at the airport this moening, i dunno for some reason i couldn't show her, and i looked at mary and she was crying her eyes out, i felt horrible. Seeing jackie go up the escaltor and seeing the tears in her eyes made our lives together these past 12 years flash before my eyes. i couldn't believe this was actually happening. I didn't think i would take it this hard. I wish everyone could experience what i have with their sister or brother. I wouldn't trade anything.

 

I dont know what I'm gunna do without you Jackie. I love you.
